channel.title: How do i make a npc let you select an option when you speak with it?

item.title: How do i make a npc let you select an option when you speak with it?
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

[quote=“openice123, post:16, topic:148281”][quote author=montalvom link=topic=203254.msg1794648#msg1794648 date=1191306859]
but the thing is its not a npc it is a skill menu so when you click on it it says train this skill
or
read skill menu
how would i make it tele you to these coords 2702-3424 when you click train this skill
[/quote]

im going to use playermanny2 code and change it up a bit

im pretty sure this is how you would do it

if (NpcDialogue == Npc id) { teleportToX = 2702; teleportToY = 3424; heightLevel = 0; NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; }[/quote]
but the thing is its not a npc
read closer? cuz that code u posted has npc! recheck?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a npc let you select an option when you speak with it?

item.title: How do i make a npc let you select an option when you speak with it?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

[quote=“montalvom, post:13, topic:148281”]but the thing is its not a npc it is a skill menu so when you click on it it says train this skill
or
read skill menu
how would i make it tele you to these coords 2702-3424 when you click train this skill[/quote]

im going to use playermanny2 code and change it up a bit

im pretty sure this is how you would do it

if (NpcDialogue == Npc id) { teleportToX = 2702; teleportToY = 3424; heightLevel = 0; NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; }

item.title: How do i make a npc let you select an option when you speak with it?
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

i think i know how to do it if your woodcutting place is a regular tele ou can do something like this
Search in client.java

case 9157

add

if (NpcDialogue == Npc id) { TeleTo("varrock", 0); ancientstele = false; NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; }

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a npc let you select an option when you speak with it?

item.title: How do i make a npc let you select an option when you speak with it?
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

I got this as my wc skill

sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("What would you like to do?", 2460); sendFrame126("Train this skill", 2461); sendFrame126("Read skill menu", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break; it works but now if i click train this skill how do i make it tele you somewhere and if i click on read skill menu it wont open menu how would i add this for every skill?

EDIT:I will reward you at the end

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a npc let you select an option when you speak with it?

item.title: How do i make a npc let you select an option when you speak with it?
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

u can make like a case for it… search

/*NPC Talking*/ in client.java

then add a code like this

case NPC ID: //NPC sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("Where would you like to go?", 2460); sendFrame126("your text", 2461); sendFrame126("yourtext", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

something like that…

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a npc let you select an option when you speak with it?
item.dc:creator: @montalvom montalvom
item.description:
@montalvom wrote:

How do i make a npc let you select an option when you speak with it?
What I mean is look…
At the top I want it to say.
What would you like to do?
Then The two options i want are:
Train this skill?
OR
Read skill menu?
so it would open up like so,
What would you like to do?
Train this skill?
Read skill menu?

If you don’t understand what i mean I can reword it.

ok so far i got the menu that opens up now i need is so when you click on train this skill it teles you somewhere and if you click on read skill guide it opens up a guide?
this is what my code looks like

sendFrame171(1, 2465); sendFrame171(0, 2468); sendFrame126("What would you like to do?", 2460); sendFrame126("Train this skill", 2461); sendFrame126("Read skill menu", 2462); sendFrame164(2459); NpcDialogueSend = true; break;

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a npc let you select an option when you speak with it?
